Scene:
The Obi Shop
(Obiya / 帯屋)

Play: The Love of Ohan and Choemon (桂川連理柵)

Production: October 1970

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Tokutayū (豊竹十九大夫)

Takemoto Oritayū V (see also Takemoto Tsunatayū IX) (竹本織大夫 (五))



Shamisen Players:

Nozawa Kichibei IX (野澤吉兵衛 (九))

Nozawa Kinshi IV (野澤錦糸 (四))
